gw.plugin.document.impl

Class BaseDocumentProductionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.document.impl.BaseDocumentProductionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, IDocumentProduction, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseGosuDocumentProductionImpl, BaseMailMergeDocumentProductionImpl, BaseServerSideDocumentProductionImpl, ServerSideExcelDocumentProduction, ServerSideWordDocumentProduction

    public abstract class BaseDocumentProductionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDocumentProduction
    The root implementation of the internal IDocumentProduction implementations. All of the document creation classes which are part of the core Guidewire code extend from this class. They generally only support synchronous creation of documents.

    see IDocumentProduction for more information.

    Author:
    bjohnson

      • addSymbolsToSymbolTable

        protected void addSymbolsToSymbolTable(ISymbolTable symbolTable,
                                       IDocumentTemplateDescriptor template,
                                       java.util.Map symbols)
        Add symbols to the IScriptHost based on the template descriptor (context objects, form fields, etc)
        Parameters:
        symbolTable - The IScriptHost which will be used to generate the document.
        template - The template on which the document will be based
        symbols - A map of name->values which will be added to the IScriptHost context

                                          IDocumentTemplateDescriptor template)
        Evaluate the form field values for the document template, based on the current SymbolTable context, and add them to the SymbolTable context.
        Parameters:
        symbolTable - The ISymbolTable which will be used to generate the document.
        template - The template on which the document will be based

      • getFormFieldValue

        protected java.lang.Object getFormFieldValue(ISymbolTable symbolTable,
                                             IDocumentTemplateDescriptor template,
                                             java.lang.String fieldName)
        Determine the value of a particular form field, based on the current ISymbolTable context.
        Parameters:
        symbolTable - The ISymbolTable which will be used to generate the document.
        template - The template on which the document will be based
        fieldName - The name of the form field whose value should be returned
        Returns:
        The evaluated value of the form field, based on the current SymbolTable context.

      • makeStringFrom

        protected java.lang.String makeStringFrom(java.lang.Object obj)
        Return the string version of an object, suitable for insertion into the created document. Mostly just maps null to "" and formats dates consistently.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object whose string representation should be returned
        Returns:
        The appropriate string representation of the object.

      • getFieldValue

        protected java.lang.String getFieldValue(ISymbolTable symbolTable,
                                         IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                         java.lang.String fieldName)
        Get the value of a particular form field in the template
        Parameters:
        symbolTable - symbol table
        templateDescriptor - The template on which the document will be based
        fieldName - The name of the form field to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The value of the form field, based on the current ISymbolTable context

      • getFormFieldValues

        protected java.lang.String[] getFormFieldValues(ISymbolTable symbolTable,
                                                IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                                java.lang.String[] names)
        Evaluate the indicated set of form fields and return the values which should be merged into the document
        Parameters:
        symbolTable - The ISymbolTable which will be used to generate the document.
        templateDescriptor - The template on which the document will be based
        names - The names of the form fields to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The values of the form fields, based onthe current ISymbolTable context

      • createDocumentSynchronously

        public DocumentContentsInfo createDocumentSynchronously(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                                        java.util.Map parameters,
                                                        Document document)
        Synchronously create a document from the given template descriptor and parameter map. The document parameter may be modified by to set certain fields.
        Specified by:
        createDocumentSynchronously in interface IDocumentProduction
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template descriptor on which the new document will be based
        parameters - A set of parameters which will be used as inputs to the document generation
        document - The new Document object which will be persisted to represent the new document content. It is permissible for the IDocumentProduction implementation to modify this object.
        Returns:
        A DocumentContentsInfo which contains the results of the document generation. For Excel documents, this will consist of a JavaScript file which, when returned to the client machine, will run to produce the document content.
